characters: A white van is driving on the road. A red truck is parked on the left side of the road. A man in a white shirt is standing on the left side of the road.
summary: The self-driving vehicle is traveling on a road in a rural area. From 0.0s to 4.0s, the vehicle is approaching a white van. From 5.0s to 10.0s, the vehicle is approaching a red truck parked on the left side of the road. A man in a white shirt is standing on the left side of the road, near the red truck.
actions: The vehicle is driving at a constant speed on a straight road. The driver is maintaining the speed because the road is clear and there are no immediate obstacles. The vehicle is approaching a parked red truck on the left side of the road.
